gain.description: Controls the amount of amplification applied to the input signal.
gain.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation of gain to create effects like tremolo or dynamic volume changes.

gain.description: Controls the amount of amplification applied to the input signal.
gain.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation of gain to create effects like tremolo or dynamic volume changes.

gain.description: Sets the base gain applied to the input signal.
gain.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation of gain for tremolo or dynamic volume changes.

gain cv +/-.description: Attenuates the effect of the CV input on gain modulation.

gain.description: Control Voltage input for dynamic gain modulation.
gain.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation to control gain dynamically.

freq.description: The cutoff frequency of the high-pass filter.
freq.modulationDescription: Modulating the cutoff frequency allows for dynamic filtering effects.

Q.description: The resonance or quality factor of the filter.
Q.modulationDescription: Higher Q values emphasize frequencies around the cutoff point.

freq cv +/-.description: Control Voltage input for dynamically modulating the cutoff frequency.
freq cv +/-.modulationDescription: Allows for sweeps or envelope-controlled filtering.

Q cv +/-.description: Control Voltage input for dynamically modulating the resonance.
Q cv +/-.modulationDescription: Modulating the Q value changes how sharply the filter emphasizes the cutoff frequency.

freq.description: Control Voltage input for dynamically modulating the cutoff frequency.
freq.modulationDescription: Allows for sweeps or envelope-controlled filtering.

Q.description: Control Voltage input for dynamically modulating the resonance.
Q.modulationDescription: Modulating the Q value changes how sharply the filter emphasizes the cutoff frequency.

frequency.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation of the frequency to create vibrato or FM synthesis effects.

type.description: The waveform shape of the oscillator.

freq cv +/-.description: The attenuverter of the frequency CV input
freq cv +/-.modulationDescription: The attenuverter of the frequency CV input

frequency.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation of the frequency to create vibrato or FM synthesis effects.

delayTime.description: The delay time applied to the input signal.
delayTime.modulationDescription: Audio-rate modulation of the delay time. Connect an AudioNode to modulate this parameter.

time cv +/-.description: The attenuverter of the delayTime CV input
time cv +/-.modulationDescription: The attenuverter of the delayTime CV input

feedback cv +/-.description: attenuverter for the feedback into the delay buffer
feedback cv +/-.modulationDescription: attenuverter for the dfeedback into the delay buffer

dryWet.description: dry/wet ratio of the output signal
dryWet.modulationDescription: dry/wet ratio of the output signal

dryWet cv +/-.description: attenuverter for the dry/wet ratio of the output signal
dryWet cv +/-.modulationDescription: attenuverter for the dry/wet ratio of the output signal

stepCount.description: Number of steps in the sequence.

tempo.description: Controls the speed of the sequence.
tempo.modulationDescription: Can be modulated for tempo variations.

tempo cv +/-.description: The attenuverter of the tempo CV input
tempo cv +/-.modulationDescription: The attenuverter of the tempo CV input

pulseWidth.description: Width of the gate relative to the tempo
pulseWidth.modulationDescription: Can be modulated for dynamic gate timing.

numSteps.description: Number of available steps in the sequence.

activeSteps.description: Number of active steps in the sequence.

tempo.description: Controls the speed of the sequence.
tempo.modulationDescription: Can be modulated for tempo variations.

tempo cv +/-.description: The attenuverter of the tempo CV input
tempo cv +/-.modulationDescription: The attenuverter of the tempo CV input

ratchet.description: Number of ratchets per active step.

ratchet cv +/-.description: Attenuverter of number of ratchets per active step.

gainA.modulationDescription: Allows modulation of input A's amplitude.

gainB.modulationDescription: Allows modulation of input B's amplitude.
